title: Retirement Advisor: More Important Than ‘Time In The Market’
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Investors need to step up and do the hard work of saving their own capital for retirement. This podcast (6:06) suggests that the calendar, that is to say the passage of time, is a less reliable guide to success than human effort and accomplishment. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
